organic.title: Raising Hell: id Software's DOOM 3 For PC Ships To Retail
organic.snippet: The next generation in PC gaming has arrived with the release of DOOM 3," said Todd Hollenshead, CEO, id Software. "DOOM 3 is a total assault on your senses.
